metadata.title: CVE-2022-0725 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in keepass. The vulnerability occurs due to logging theplain text passwords in system log and leads to an Information Exposurevulnerability. This flaw allows an attacker to interact and read sensitivepasswords and logs.

criterions.comment: keepass2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
